{{ambox|type=clean | text=''This page is under construction and requires cleaning''}}\nThis page describes [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Resource_Description_Framework RDF] binding of [[WebEx]] data model as part of [[ADAPT2 RDF Binding]] initiative. \n\n== ER Model and RDF Bindings==\n* '''<span id="scope">scope</span>''' - collection (set, bag) of [[#dissection|dissections]] - [[rss#channel|rss:channel]] <span style='color:white;background-color:green;padding:2px;'>Done</span>, alternatively [[dcmitypes#Collection|dcmitypes:Collection]]\n** <span id="scope.name">scope.name</span> - [[rss#channel.title|rss:channel.title]] <span style='color:white;background-color:green;padding:2px;'>Done</span>\n** <span id="scope.description">scope.description</span> - [[rss#channel.description|rss:channel.description]] <span style='color:white;background-color:green;padding:2px;'>Done</span>\n** <span id="scope.hasDissection">scope.hasDissection</span> - [[rss#channel.items|rss:channel.items]] <span style='color:white;background-color:green;padding:2px;'>Done</span>\n* '''<span id="dissection">dissection</span>''' - \n** <span id="dissection.name">dissection.name</span> - [[rss#item.title|rss:item.title]] <span style='color:white;background-color:green;padding:2px;'>Done</span>\n** <span id="dissection.description">dissection.description</span> - [[rss#item.description|rss:item.description]] <span style='color:white;background-color:green;padding:2px;'>Done</span>\n** <span id="dissection.hasLine">dissection.hasLine</span> - \n* '''<span id="line">line</span>''' - \n* '''<span id="annotation">annotation</span>''' -\n\n== See also ==\n* [[WebEx]]\n* [[ADAPT2 RDF Binding]]
